00126 #ifndef __INCvxWorksh
00127 /* VxWorks already defines STATUS and BOOL. Compiler gets mad if you 
00128 ** redefine them. */
00129 /* __INCvxWorksh will get #defined by std. include files included from tds.h
00130 */
00131 #ifdef STATUS
00132 /* On DU4.0d we get a conflicting STATUS definition from arpa/nameser.h
00133    when _REENTRANT is defined.
00134 */
00135 #undef STATUS
00136 #endif
00137 typedef int STATUS;
00138 typedef unsigned char BOOL;
00139 #endif

00173 typedef struct tag_DBPROC_ROWBUF
00174 {
00175         int buffering_on;       /* (boolean) is row buffering turned on?     */
00176         int first_in_buf;       /* result set row number of first row in buf */
00177         int next_row;           /* result set row number of next row         */
00178         int newest;             /* index of most recent item in queue        */
00179         int oldest;             /* index of least recent item in queue       */
00180         int elcount;            /* max element count that buffer can hold    */
00181         int element_size;       /* size in bytes of each element in queue    */
00182         int rows_in_buf;        /* # of rows currently in buffer             */
00183         void *rows;             /* pointer to the row storage                */
00184 } DBPROC_ROWBUF;
